one_liner: Artifacts show a pivot from reactive fixes to proactive governance of the validator and command cadence.
six_bullets: Handshake confirms digest coherence and policy alignment.
Triad balances artifact discipline with creative slack.
Sandbox probe outlines safe counterfactual handling.
Mode bench highlights balanced strategy for validator hardening.
SEP preview + plan set the stage for validator fix and /profile gate.

compact_page.context: Analyzed last 6 artifacts to extract operational drift signals.
observations: Validator governance now explicit via handshake and SEP artifacts.
Continuity emphasis reduces risk of orphaned artifacts.
Mode benchmarking suggests balanced planning for quality gates.
implications: Need instrumentation to compare canonical vs full digests on every run.
Sandbox guidelines should link back to mode bench to avoid duplication.

deltas: Add automatic digest telemetry to validator outputs (implemented).
Standardize artifact parent references (documented in continuity snapshot).
Define /profile gating scope before enabling evolution (captured in SEP preview).
sep_idea: SEP-0001 formalizes validator hardening and introduces /profile quality gate under guarded rollout.
